[Page Title: Chicken Wings & Sports Bar in Charleston, South Carolina - Hooters]

Skip to Content Hooters of N. Charleston Closed • Opening at 11:00am Order Online Order Catering Make Your Favorite Favorite 843-824-8661 2171 Northwoods Blvd. Charleston, SC, 29406 Get Directions Other Locations 
Store Hours
Monday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Tuesday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Wednesday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Thursday: 11:00am - 11:00pm Friday: 11:00am - 12:00am Saturday: 11:00am - 12:00am Sunday: 11:00am - 11:00pm 
We know, even if you’re not into spicy, you’re into hot. That’s why all of our seriously craveable flavors are the best of the best. Wings, burgers, shrimp, all the things that make you drool.

Location Highlights
Hooters TV Delivery Gift Cards Carryout HootClub Rewards Smartphone Pay* Patio Seating Free WiFi *We accept smartphone payments from Apple Pay and Google Pay 
The Home of Ice Cold Brew

Nothing goes with world-famous wings like a tall, frosty beer. That's why you can always count on us to quench your thirst with old favorites, or give you the opportunity to try something new.

Fall Football Beers

Come in for an ice-cold Bud, Bud Light, Stella or Dos Equis. They're our featured front line all season.

Hooters is hiring!

We’re looking for a few good men and a lot of great women to help make the world more fun! If you or someone you know is looking for flexible hours, competitive pay, tuition reimbursement, employee discounts and real opportunity to advance, you’re ready to join the ranks.
View Jobs About Hooters of N. Charleston 
Enjoy world famous wings and a great beer selection at Hooters of N. Charleston. Eat-in or carryout, the best food in South Carolina can always be found right in Charleston. Daily happy hour specials, drink specials and craft beer on tap.
